# controlTint

**Instance Property**

The scroller’s control tint.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controlTint: NSControlTint { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid values for `controlTint` are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControlTint].
